name: Strawberry Hunter
description:
So in my most recent search on a files from an old computer, i've some pretty intresting stuff.

-A database of "GK-000-0001-1" It's something related with pumpkin

-Some old files from a cancelled game called Strawberry Hunter.

The games files was broken and unfinished, it looks likes just a casual generic mobile game made for a cash grab through ads. However with this brand new version that i've made, there's no ads and the game is working fully now!!!

ENJOY!

Game by CoffeBreakDev

OST by CoffeBreakDev / Angel Bernas
